text:
Liga
Barcelona: Rakitic to the exit
Ivan Rakitic, the talented midfielder is persona non grata in Catalonia. The departure of the Croatian has been going on since last summer and FC Barcelona does not want to continue the adventure with him.
01 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Nils Constant



Announced on the start since the last transfer window, Ernesto Valverde gives more time to the Croatian international play and Rakitic knows that there is competition at this position with the arrival of the Dutch international and ex play of Ajax Amsterdam, Frenkie De Jong and the Brazilian Arthur.




Not at the rival




Barcelona + 21 ðŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

However, the Catalan club does not want to let go of its superstar for a direct title contender. Even if AtlÃ©tico Madrid are on the record for the recruitment of this January, the leaders of Barcelona will not give in to the offer of a rival of La Liga.

The winter transfer window is fast approaching and we will certainly see Ivan Rakitic on the small papers of the English or Italian clubs.
